Hi,

All I want to do is this: I want to mark some of my test methods with =
my 
own annotation (e.g. @integration) instead of @test.  Then when this te=
st 
case runs, these methods will check something like an environment 
vari=
able to determine whether it should run (like @test) or do nothing (like 
@=
ignore).

I figure I have to derive my own test runners to do this (@runWit=
h
(myTest.class)).  However, since JUnit4ClassRunner is internal and it's 
=
not documented, where can I find instructions/documents on what and how 
to=
 derive from it?  Or is there a better way to achieve what we need here?

T=
hanks!
